content: फण् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (फणति, फणित) {@--1@} To move, move about; रुरुजुर्भेजिरे फेणुर्बहुधा हरिराक्षसाः <ls>Bk. 14. 78.</ls> {@--2@} To produce easily or without exertion; (this sense according to some belongs to the {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} of फण्). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (फाणयति) To skim, take off (the surface of a fluid.).
